resources.string: CLICK and PLAY to Give Away

This is a non-profit organization that serves a few Charities which make an impact and conduct activities focused on improving the quality of life for people and animals and on protecting and conserving nature. 
Our greatest fulfillment is to make a difference for those who need support, to provide a better living for them and a clean environment that supports life in all its forms. 
We strive to do anything that we can in order to make a better world and we inspire others to do the same. 
We work with a few Sponsors that donate money to Charities based on this organizationâ€™s activity.
